attributes.action: take all uninsured and untaxed vehicles off the road
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: any one found driving an untaxed or uninsured vehicle will have the vehicle immobilised and will have 7 days to produce documents or the vehicle will be crushed

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "take all uninsured and untaxed vehicles off the road."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11188.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/carcheats/
